title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 208.22 - Matchmakers not to employ boxers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 208.22 - Matchmakers not to employ boxers

State Regulations

No licensed matchmaker shall employ or be in any way
commercially connected with any boxer, mixed martial artist, manager or second
except as otherwise directed or authorized by the Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
208.22

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
